thread.section_title: Dallas-Fort Worth Running News - Sports News for Dallas, Texas
thread.title: This week's race schedule: Oct. 13-18
thread.title_full: This week's race schedule: Oct. 13-18 | Dallas Morning News

author: Debbie Fetterman
title: This week's race schedule: Oct. 13-18
text:
TUESDAY, OCT. 13
Plano Pacers Prediction Race 5K, Schimelpfenig Library, 5024 Custer Road (1 block south of Spring Creek Parkway on the east side of Custer), Plano, 7 p.m., free, www.planopacers.org .
THURSDAY, OCT. 15
Friends of the River Party on the Plaza 6K/2K, Montgomery Plaza, 2600 W. 7 th St., Fort Worth, 6K 6:15 p.m., 2K 6:30 p.m., $33 untimed, $38 timed, Kids 12 and under $10, www.friendsoftheriverfw.com .
Long Run 5K/1-mile fun run, J.L. Long Middle School, 6116 Reiger Ave., Dallas, 1-mile fun run/walk 6 p.m., 5K 6:30 p.m., youth $15, Adults $20, 214-542-3649 or www.raceroster.com , then search by race name.
SATURDAY, OCT. 17
Around the Mound 5K/fun run, Shadow Ridge Middle School, 2050 Aberdeen Drive, Flower Mound, 1-mile 8 a.m., 5K 8:30 a.m., 5K $25, 1-mile $15, www.aroundthemound5K.com .
Cattleman's Classic 5K Run for the Beef, Celebration Plaza, 100 Gilmer St., Sulphur Springs, 8 a.m., $30, getmeregistered.com, then search by race name.
Dogs in Disguise , Katherine Rose Park, 409 N. Walnut Creek Drive, Mansfield, 1-mile 8 a.m., 5K 8:30 a.m., 1-mile $25, 5K $35, https://thedriven.net , then click Event List.
Fallen Heroes 5K, 1700 Shoal Creek Drive, Highland Village, 4 p.m., $25, www.runsignup.com,then search by race name.
Fort Worth Police and Firefighters Memorial Run, Police and Firefighter Memorial, 2201 W. 7 th St., Fort Worth, 8:30 a.m., $30, www.runsignup.com , the search by race name.
Haslet Hustle 5K, Haslet Community Park, Haslet, 1-mile 7 p.m., 5K 7:30 p.m., $35, www.haslet.org .
Haunt Jaunt 5K/Fun Run, Oak Point Park, 2801 E. Spring Creek Parkway, Plano, 5K $30, $34 race day,, 1-mile $10, $14 race day, Chip timing $5 optional, www.hauntjaunt.com .
Homecoming 5K SuperHero Race, Stephenville City Park, 378 W. Long Street, Stephenville, 8 a.m., $25, 254-968-0762 or www.tarleton.edu/recsports .
Hungry Hound Hustle, Villages of Bear Creek Park, 951 Bear Creek Parkway, Euless, 1-mile 8:30 a.m., 5K 9 a.m.$35 today, $40 race day, www.hungryhoundhustle.athlete360.com .
Kerens Cotton Row Run, Kerens Alumni Center, Kerens,8 a.m. $20, 903-654-8138 or www.facebook.com , then search by race name.
Komen Dallas Race for the Cure, NorthPark Center, 8687 North Central Expressway, Dallas, 8 a.m., Adults $39, Youth 12 and under $20, Chip timing $5, http://dallas.info-komen.org .
Midlothian Fall Festival/5K, 1800 S. 14 th St., Midlothian, 8 a.m., Adults $20, Youth 14 and under $3, www.midlothianchamber.org
Monster Kid's Tri, Keller Natatorium, 1000 Bear Creek Parkway, Keller, $35, 7:30 a.m., 214-502-9837 or www.dallasathletesracing.com .
Muddy Monster Mash 5K/Kids Mile, Bearcat Car Wash, 1234 Washington St., Pilot Point, 8 a.m., $50 Competitive wave, $45 other waves 8:30 a.m. and after, Kids mile $15, www.facebook.com , then search Sharkarosa Mud Run Series.
REI Run Series DFW Run the Trinity, Trinity River Audubon Center, 6500 Great Trinity Forest Way, Dallas, 9 a.m., $15, www.rei.com , then search events.
Rugged and Raw 10K/20K Trail run, Cedar Ridge Preserve, 7171 Mountain Creek Parkway, Dallas, 8 a.m., 10K $50, 20K $60, rugged-and-raw.com .
Run Fest 5K, City Lake Park, Live Oak & Country Line Road, Royce City, 9 a.m., 18-and-over $30, 17 and under $25, http://runfest5K.itsyourrace.com .
Running Scared 5K/1-mile, Watauga Community Center, 7901 Indian Springs Road, Watauga, 8:30 a.m., Adults $12, Youth $10, www.quickscores.com .
Strides against Violence 5K/1K fun run, The Plaza at Galatyn Park, 2379 Performance Drive, Richardson, 8 a.m., $50, http://stridestx.org .
Super Run, Myers Park & Event Center, 7117 County Road 166, McKinney, 8:30 a.m., 1K $15, 5K $45, http://thesuperrun.com .
T-Rex 10K Trail Run, Trophy Club Park Entrance, 2885 Trophy Park Drive, Trophy Club, 8 a.m., www.facebook.com , then search by race name.
SUNDAY, OCT. 18
Carrollton Runners Club Prediction Run 5K, McInnish Park,1-mile west of U.S. Interstate 35 off Sandy Lake Road, Carrollton, 7:30 a.m., $2 pre-registered, $3 race day, www.deltaviewtiming.com .
Honored Hero Run 5K/10K/Half Marathon/20-miles/1K, Trinity Park, 2300 West 7 th St., Fort Worth, 1K 7:40 a.m., 20- mile 7:30 a.m., Half 8 a.m., 10K 8:20 a.m., 5K 8:30 a.m., http://honoredherorun.com or www.coxracingservices.com .
Monster Keller Tri (300-meter swim/12-mile bike/3.1-mile run) , Keller Natatorium, 1000 Bear Creek Parkway, Keller, 7:30 a.m., $89, www.dallasathletesracing.com .
U.S. Open Triathlon Olympic (1500-meter swim/21-mile bike/6-mile run) /Sprint (750-meter swim/10-.5 mile bike/3 mile run) /Super Sprint (300-meter swim/10.5-mile bike/1.5-mile run) /Youth (distanc es vary) /5K , The Marina of Rockwall Harbor, 2055 Summer Lee Drive, Rockwall, Olympic 7:45 a.m., Sprint 8 a.m., Super Sprint 8:10 a.m., 5K 8:20 a.m., Youth 10 a.m., Olympic $150, Olympic Elite Amateur $175, Sprint $120, Super Sprint $110, Youth Splash N' Dahs, $40, Relay $220, 5K $35, 214-697-6922 or www.playtri.com , then search races. (USA Triathlon membership required. One-day permit $12, annual membership $45.)
That Dam Half/5K, Lake Park, Lake Lewisville, Half marathon 8 a.m., 5K 8:30 a.m., 5K $35 race week, $40 race day, Half Marathon $85 race week, $95 race day, 5K for children 12 & under or fun run $20, 214-751-7911, ext. 103 or www.runproject.org , then search by race name.
On Twitter:
 @DFWRunning
